attributes.action: Report the EU referendum results by district's like every other election result
attributes.background: The referendum results should be publicised by a tally of district or regional results, it would show leave having a majority of about 66% not the 52% that is causing social media hatred, new governments are elected on a little as 30% and that doesn't cause picketing or demonstrations

rejection.details: In any case, it is now too late to change the way in which the votes were counted.
